sections.heading: 01|Authorized types of business
sections.text: Effective:March 20, 1972Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 444 - 109th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFNo life insurance company, organized under the laws of this state, shall undertake any business or risk except as provided in this section, and no company,

sections.heading: (A) As used in this section, "employer" means any individual, sole proprietorship, partnership, limited liability company, corporation, or any other entity that is doing business in this state
sections.text: "Employer" also includes all entities or persons that are controlled by or affiliated with any such indivi
